rows.label: tev057201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Ntoto about the indigens in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Ntoto about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Ntoto about the indigens in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0001
rows.name:
Arenatect herd northwest of Lake Ciel gave Ntoto
trouble during journey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Why? Because arenatects like to hide by burying
selves in sand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then when poor Ntoto approach... Pshooooo!
Toxic spores everywhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ntoto had to hightail it outta there before
nopopotamus was done in by poison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Thankfully it survived... Only so FRIEND could do
it in instead! Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0006
rows.name:
Well, at least everything worked out in the end.
No hard feelings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Sounds like Nio decided to give up post in Cauldros
and come start new job here instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0009
rows.name:
Nio had soft spot for Popo as far back as Ntoto can
remember.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0010
rows.name: *sigh* Some Nopon just cannot be changed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh well! If Nio is ready to buckle down,
then Ntoto will also get to buckling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Time to start scouring area for ways to make mega
moolah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Friend should stay away from cavern called Behemoth's
Shadows near Southern Delusian Mountain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0018
rows.name:
Rumor says that cavern has really scary creature who
lurks on ceiling and waits to ambush unsuspecting prey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0019
rows.name: The moment friend looks away... CHOMP![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Friend may be strong enough to make short work
of mighty nopopotamus of Ntoto...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057201_MSG0021
rows.name:
But strength not going to help much against deadly
surprise ambush! Unless friend is super confident,
friend should be smart and steer clear.[ST:wait ]
